name: There is a Ghost in the System
name_original: There is a Ghost in the System
description:
Note: A controller is needed to play this game.

There is a Ghost in the System is an arcade style maze game with a twist. Enemies can move through walls and you need to cleverly utilize your teleportation ability to avoid them. Solve simple item collection missions and use power-ups to increase your score!

This game was originally made as part of the University of Würzburg's Game Lab I module. Some quality of life improvements have been made since the end of Game Lab, but the base game is the same.

Music by Karl Casey @White Bat Audio.
